exceptions.tactic: intros g f l x H1 H2.
intros g' f l x H1 H2.
intros g' f' l x H1 H2.
intros g' f' l' x H1 H2.
intros g' f' l' x' H1 H2.

original: intros g f l x H1 H2. unfold is_lim in H2. unfold is_lim. intros eps. specialize (H2 eps). unfold Rbar_locally' in H1. destruct x. - apply H2. intros δ H3. unfold Rbar_locally in H3. unfold Rbar_locally. red in H3. red. destruct (Rbar_le_lt_or_eq_dec l (g r)). + specialize (H1 r). apply H1 in H. destruct H as [M H4]. exists M. intros y H5. apply H4 in H5. unfold Rminus in H5. unfold Rabs. apply Rabs_def2. lra. + rewrite e. apply H3. - apply H2. intros M H3. exists M. intros y H4. apply H3 in H4. apply H4. - apply H2. intros M H3. exists M. intros y H4. apply H3 in H4. apply H4.
